info.name: Nimapara College Feedback System API
info.description: API collection for testing the feedback system backend endpoints

  "studentName": "John Doe",

  "teachingMethods": "The teaching methods are very effective. Professors use a combination of lectures, practical sessions, and group discussions which helps in better understanding of concepts.",

}

{
